entry.title: Critical security alert

entry.content:
.awl a {color: #FFFFFF; text-decoration: none;} .abml a {color: #000000; font-family: Roboto-Medium,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: none;} .adgl a {color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.87); text-decoration: none;} .afal a {color: #b0b0b0; text-decoration: none;} @media screen and (min-width: 600px) {.v2sp {padding: 6px 30px 0px;} .v2rsp {padding: 0px 10px;}} @media screen and (min-width: 600px) {.mdv2rw {padding: 40px 40px;}}
Access for less secure apps setting has been turned on
imyamanhitelnet@gmail.com
Access for less secure apps setting has been turned on for your Google Account imyamanhitelnet@gmail.com. If you didn't change it, you should check what happened.
Check activity
You can also see security activity at
https://myaccount.google.com/notifications
You received this email to let you know about important changes to your Google Account and services.
© 2021 Google LLC, 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043, USA

Sign-in attempt was blocked
imyamanhitelnet@gmail.com
Someone just used your password to try to sign in to your account from a non-Google app. Google blocked them, but you should check what happened. Review your account activity to make sure no one else has access.
Check activity
You can also see security activity at
https://myaccount.google.com/notifications
You received this email to let you know about important changes to your Google Account and services.
© 2021 Google LLC, 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043, USA

entry.title: Migrate your Google Cloud Billing Accounts before March 21, 2021 to avoid termination
entry.summary: .appleLinksWhite a { color: #898989 !important; text-decoration: none !important; cursor: default !important; pointer-events: none !important; } a { color:#2979ff; font-family:Roboto, arial; font-size:14px; text-decoration:none; } @media only screen and (min-width : 0px) and (max-width : 480px) { .flexible{ width: 100%...
entry.content:
.appleLinksWhite a { color: #898989 !important; text-decoration: none !important; cursor: default !important; pointer-events: none !important; } a { color:#2979ff; font-family:Roboto, arial; font-size:14px; text-decoration:none; } @media only screen and (min-width : 0px) and (max-width : 480px) { .flexible{ width: 100% !important; min-width: 100% !important; max-width: 100% !important; } .logo_holder, .logo_holder_td, .logo_right_holder, .logo_right_holder_td{width: 100% !important;} .logo_right_holder_inner_td {text-align:right !important;} .logo_holder_td{padding-left: 16px;} .logo_right_holder_td{padding-left: 16px !important; padding-top: 5px !important; padding-bottom: 15px !important;} .tbl_banner{padding-left : 10px !important; padding-right: 10px !important; } .banner_text_1{padding: 0 20px 15px 20px !important;} .banner_container {background-position:top !important; background-color: #227cdf !important; height:auto !important;} .banner_btn{padding-bottom:20px !important;} .banner_text_2{128px 20px 13px 20px !important; font-size:26px !important;line-height:30px !important;} .bottom_link_container_td{padding:10px 40px !important;} .bottom_link_container_inner{padding:10px 0 !important;} .bottom_link_text_mbl{padding:10px 0 !important;} .outer_wrapper_td{padding:0 5px !important;} } @media only screen and (min-width : 0px) and (max-width : 320px) { .flexible{ width: 100% !important; min-width: 100% !important; max-width: 100% !important; } .logo_holder, .logo_holder_td, .logo_right_holder, .logo_right_holder_td{width: 100% !important;} .banner_text_2{128px 20px 13px 20px !important; font-size:26px !important;line-height:30px !important;} .logo_right_holder_td{padding-left: 16px !important; padding-top: 5px !important; padding-bottom: 15px !important;} .logo_right_holder_inner_td {text-align:right !important;} .logo_holder_td{padding-left: 0 !important;} .banner_text_1{padding: 0 20px 15px 20px !important;} .banner_container {background-position:top !important; background-color: #227cdf !important; height:auto !important;} .banner_btn{padding-bottom:20px !important;} .bottom_link_container_td{padding:10px 40px !important;} .bottom_link_text_mbl{padding:10px 0 !important;} .outer_wrapper_td{padding:0 5px !important;} .bottom_link_container_inner{padding:10px 0 !important;} .social_icons_container_inner{width:210px !important;} .tbl_banner{padding-left : 10px !important; padding-right: 10px !important; } }
Any non-migrated accounts will be terminated and the containing data will be deleted by March 21.
MY CONSOLE

Hello Google Cloud Platform Customer,

As you have already been notified earlier this year, your Google Cloud Platform (GCP) billing account(s) will be migrated to Google Cloud Korea LLC and KRW payments as the billing in your local currency, South Korean won (KRW) is now available. All customers with a South Korea address are required to be billed under Google Cloud Korea LLC.

We noticed that your account has not been migrated to your local currency, KRW. It’s important that you migrate your accounts to Google Cloud Korea LLC and KRW currency as soon as possible, since non-migrated accounts will be terminated by March 21, 2021.

Please note that your GCP resources or your pricing will not be affected by this migration, and will continue to run as usual.

What do I need to do?

Take a few minutes to migrate your GCP accounts, including any free tier or free trial accounts, to local currency payments. All customers with a South Korea address must do so to avoid future account termination.

To migrate your accounts, click on your GCP billing account(s) listed below and follow the instructions in your GCP console (you can find detailed instructions in the GCP Korea Migration FAQ listed below). If you are a registered business, you will need to have your business registration number and related tax information ready for tax-related purposes:

  • Billing Account: 01CDB7-731D1D-74DC29

If your unmigrated GCP billing account is terminated, your data on GCP will be deleted as set out in the Data Processing and Security Terms (Section 6.2). You are responsible for exporting your data on GCP that you wish to retain before expiration or termination.

Google enables you, in a manner consistent with the functionality of GCP services, to export your data. Data exporting depends on how you have chosen to store your data.

  • For exporting your data on Compute Engine, you can export/import an entire VM image in the form of a .tar archive. Find more information on images and storage options on our Compute Engine Documentation page.
  • For exporting your data on Big Query service, please see ‘Exporting table data’.
  • To review other services you are using, we recommend you to check the Google Cloud Documentation or you can contact Google Cloud Support for your questions about the functionality of GCP services.
What do I need to know?

When you migrate your GCP billing accounts:

  • The contracting party of your GCP, Google Maps Platform services, if applicable, will change to Google Cloud Korea LLC as a reseller (with offices located at Gangnam Finance Center 20fl., 152 Teheran-ro, Gangnam-gu, Seoul).
  • The currency of your account will change to KRW. Your pricing will not change.
  • Google Asia Pacific Pte Ltd will assign and transfer your Google Cloud Platform License Agreement and your Google Maps Platform License Agreement, if applicable, to Google Cloud Korea LLC, as Google Asia Pacific’s reseller. Your account information, including your email address and other contact information associated with it, will be transferred to Google Cloud Korea LLC.
  • Google Cloud Korea LLC will issue your invoices.
  • In accordance with local Korea laws, these invoices will be subject to Value Added Tax (VAT).
Need more information or help?
  • Learn more about local currencies and exchange rates.
  • For more information, please read the GCP Korea Migration FAQ.
  • If you have any questions or require assistance, please do not hesitate to contact Google Cloud Billing Support.

Thank you for being a valued Google Cloud Platform customer.
CONTACT GOOGLE CLOUD BILLING SUPPORT
Sincerely,
The Google Cloud Platform Team
DOCUMENTATION
SUPPORT

© 2021 Google LLC 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043

You have received this mandatory service announcement to update you about important changes to Google Cloud Platform or your account.

entry.title: Re-verify ownership of your Hosting domain
entry.summary: Re-verify ownership of your Hosting domainOpen ConsoleYour project's Hosting domain ownership is no longer verified. You have 30 days remaining to re-verify ownership of myhealthdata.co.kr before it is removed and stops serving content.Please re-verify ownership of the domain myhealthdata.co.kr...
entry.content:
Re-verify ownership of your Hosting domain
Open Console
Your project's Hosting domain ownership is no longer verified. You have 30 days remaining to re-verify ownership of myhealthdata.co.kr before it is removed and stops serving content.
Please re-verify ownership of the domain myhealthdata.co.kr connected to myhealthdata-teasing.
The previous verification for this domain has been lost. This can happen if you remove the site's verification DNS records from your domain provider, or if the user who completed the verification no longer has permission to add domains on the Firebase project. Allowed roles include Owner, Editor, and Develop Admin.
Ownership Verification Lost
myhealthdata-teasing
Hosting domain
myhealthdata.co.kr
Days remaining
30 days
Verify domain
If you have questions or feel you've received this message in error, please contact Firebase support
Thanks for using Firebase!
Google LLC
1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy
Mountain View, CA, 94043 USA

font-family:Roboto, arial; font-size:14px; text-decoration:none; } @media only screen and (min-width : 0px) and (max-width : 480px) { .flexible{ width: 100% !important; min-width: 100% !important; max-width: 100% !important; } .logo_holder, .logo_holder_td, .logo_right_holder, .logo_right_holder_td{width: 100% !important;} .logo_right_holder_inner_td {text-align:right !important;} .logo_holder_td{padding-left: 16px;} .logo_right_holder_td{padding-left: 16px !important; padding-top: 5px !important; padding-bottom: 15px !important;} .tbl_banner{padding-left : 10px !important; padding-right: 10px !important; } .banner_text_1{padding: 0 20px 15px 20px !important;} .banner_container {background-position:top !important; background-color: #227cdf !important; height:auto !important;} .banner_btn{padding-bottom:20px !important;} .banner_text_2{128px 20px 13px 20px !important; font-size:26px !important;line-height:30px !important;} .bottom_link_container_td{padding:10px 40px !important;} .bottom_link_container_inner{padding:10px 0 !important;} .bottom_link_text_mbl{padding:10px 0 !important;} .outer_wrapper_td{padding:0 5px !important;} } @media only screen and (min-width : 0px) and (max-width : 320px) { .flexible{ width: 100% !important; min-width: 100% !important; max-width: 100% !important; } .logo_holder, .logo_holder_td, .logo_right_holder, .logo_right_holder_td{width: 100% !important;} .banner_text_2{128px 20px 13px 20px !important; font-size:26px !important;line-height:30px !important;} .logo_right_holder_td{padding-left: 16px !important; padding-top: 5px !important; padding-bottom: 15px !important;} .logo_right_holder_inner_td {text-align:right !important;} .logo_holder_td{padding-left: 0 !important;} .banner_text_1{padding: 0 20px 15px 20px !important;} .banner_container {background-position:top !important; padding-right: 10px !important; } }
We’ve updated the Google Cloud Third-Party Subprocessors list.
MY CONSOLE

Hello Google Cloud Customer,

We’re sending this message to let you know about the following updates to the Google Cloud Platform Subprocessors list:

  • We’re adding Lionbridge Global Sourcing Solutions, Inc. and its affiliate Lionbridge AI Finland Oy
  • We’re removing LionbridgeTechnologies, Inc. and its affiliate Lionbridge Oy

These updates are due to a Subprocessor corporate reorganization.

You can find information about the tasks our Subprocessors perform on our Google Cloud Platform Subprocessors list.

Thank you for being a valued Google Cloud customer.
Sincerely,
The Google Cloud Team
© 2021 Google LLC 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043

You have received this service announcement to update you about important changes to Google Cloud Platform or your account.

entry.title: New Firebase privacy setting
entry.summary: Mandatory Service Announcement from Firebase body{ font-family:Google Sans, Roboto, sans-serif; font-size:14px; -webkit-text-size-adjust: none !important; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased !important; -ms-text-size-adjust: none !important; } table, tr, td { border-collapse:collapse; mso-table-lspace:0pt; mso-table-rspace:0pt; } a{ color:#0288d1; text-decoration: none;"> } a:link, a:visited, a:hover, a:active {...
